segments.advisor_message: Can you tell me which country you're currently domiciled in?
segments.client_message: Yeah, uh, I live in the UK, but, um, I moved here about five years ago from Canada. So, I guess I'm, like, primarily based in the UK now.

segments.advisor_message: Got it. And are you a tax resident in the UK?
segments.client_message: Oh, right, uh, yeah, I am. I mean, I think I am, yes. Also, my job? I'm sort of like a digital marketing manager, and I work for this company called Bright Media. But, uh, my National Insurance number, it’s, um, I really can’t remember it right now. I probably should know it though!
